channel.title: Projects on Chih Yu's Land
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Chih Yu's Land

item.title: Interaction between Human Body Pose and Robot Arm Using Deep Learning and Digital Twin
item.description: This project develops an intuitive human-robot interaction (HRI) system, replaces traditional keyboard-based control with natural, vision-based interaction.

item.title: Collaborative Robotic System for Automated Retrieval and Transport
item.description: This system integrates a bio-inspired retrieval robot with a PID-controlled transport platform. Featuring a Theo Jansen linkage, a SCARA arm, and data-backed stress analysis, it demonstrates a complete workflow for automated material handling.
